content.en: Ensemble learning: Researchers have explored various ways to improve the performance of machine learning algorithms in classification tasks. They have investigated the use of ensemble learning approaches, such as random independent subspace (RIS), subspace ensembles with region partitioning and weighting, boosting combined with random subspace method (RSM), and locally applying random subspace. Other studies have focused on the use of relevant random subspaces, random subspace selection to address missing features, multi-class subspace modeling, and combining bagging, boosting, rotation forest, and random subspace methods. Additionally, researchers have explored the use of different models for regression and classification problems, supervised subspace projections, feature clustering, class separability weighting, deterministic subspace methods, F-score subspace methods, super random subspace ensemble classification, and adaptive subspace optimization.
content.da: Ensemble learning: Forskere har udforsket forskellige måder at forbedre ydeevnen af maskinlæringsalgoritmer i klassifikationsopgaver. De har undersøgt brugen af ensemble learning-metoder, såsom random independent subspace (RIS), subspace ensembles med regionsopdeling og vægtning, boosting kombineret med random subspace-metoden (RSM) og lokal anvendelse af random subspace. Andre studier har fokuseret på brugen af relevante random subspaces, random subspace-udvælgelse for at håndtere manglende træk, multi-klasse subspace-modellering og kombinationer af bagging, boosting, rotation forest og random subspace-metoder. Desuden har forskere undersøgt brugen af forskellige modeller til regressions- og klassifikationsproblemer, supervised subspace-projektioner, feature clustering, class separability-weighting, deterministiske subspace-metoder, F-score subspace-metoder, super random subspace ensemble klassifikation, og adaptiv subspace-optimering.
